scripts.copy: rm -rf build && rm -rf lib && mkdir -p build/node_modules/@webcomponents/webcomponentsjs && cp -r node_modules/@webcomponents/webcomponentsjs/bundles build/node_modules/@webcomponents/webcomponentsjs && cp node_modules/@webcomponents/webcomponentsjs/webcomponents-loader.js build/node_modules/@webcomponents/webcomponentsjs && cp index.html build && cp -r manifest build
scripts.build: npm run copy && babel src -d lib && rollup -c
